#include<bits/stdc++.h>

#define rep(i,n) for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
#define ll long long
#define pl(n) printf("%lld\n",n) 
using namespace std;

int checkprime(int x)
{
	int l=sqrt(x);
	
	if(x==1)
		return 0;
	if(x==2)
		return 1;
	
	for(int i=2;i<=l;i++)
		if(x%i==0)
			return 0;
	return 1;
}

int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		string str;
		cin>>str;
		int len=str.length();
		int freq[200]={0};
		int maxfreq=-1;
		
		rep(i,len)
		{
			freq[str[i]]++;
			if(freq[str[i]]>maxfreq)
				maxfreq=freq[str[i]];
		}
		
		if(checkprime(maxfreq)==1)
		{
			rep(i,200)
			if(freq[i]!=0 && (checkprime(freq[i])==1))
			{
				freq[i]-=freq[i]/2;
			}
		}
		
		else
		{
			rep(i,200)
			if(freq[i]!=0 && (checkprime(freq[i])==0))
				freq[i]-=freq[i]/2;
				
		}
		
		ll ans=0;
		rep(i,200)
			ans+=freq[i];
		pl(ans);
	}
	return 0;
}
